title: Dear Riot, Please do us all a favour and come up with a solution for this RAD issue.
body: "Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information." I've tried everything... Many people are experiencing this issue which is why i believe you should come up with a solution or just straight up tell us that there's no chance of playing League ever again. Which in my opinion is better than staying up 15 hours trying to fix it. So please ...

replies.body: Reds don't read the help and support boards, post this on the Misc. boards.
